Awas Terjebak! Ini Tips Lolos dari Tipu-tipu Fintech Ilegal
02 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Ilustrasi/Foto: Pinjam Online (Tim Infografis: Andhika Akbarayansyah)

Jakarta - Layanan financial technology (fintech) pinjaman online ilegal kini masih marak di Indonesia. Hal ini tercermin dari banyaknya aplikasi yang diblokir oleh Satgas Waspada Investasi hingga akhir Oktober 2019.Fintech abal-abal ini membuat resah masyarakat karena memberi bunga yang tinggi, denda yang besar hingga tak terbatas sampai penagihan yang menggunakan kekerasan serta pelecehan seksual.Karena itu, Ketua Satgas Waspada Investasi Tongam L Tobing meminta kepada masyarakat agar tak sampai terjebak jeratan fintech ilegal ini. Menutut Tongam, sebelum meminjam di fintech masyarakat harus rajin memeriksa apakah fintech tersebut terdaftar di Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) atau tidak. "Sebelum pinjam periksa dulu dia terdaftar atau tidak. Lalu kalau pinjam ya sesuaikan kebutuhannya dan jangan sampai meminjam untuk konsumtif. Baca juga syaratnya jangan sampai tidak baca lalu tahu-tahu ditagih kasar," imbuh dia, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Menurut Tongam, sebelum meminjam calon peminjam juga harus memahami risiko yang terjadi sebelum mengajukan kredit. Misalnya, harus paham jika aplikasi fintech legal yang terdaftar di OJK hanya meminta persetujuan untuk akses audio, pengambilan gambar KTP sampai akses lokasi."Kalau yang ilegal dia minta persetujuan untuk akses galeri, akses kontak. Itu sudah tidak benar lah, apa hubungannya dengan itu semua. Jadi hati-hati jangan tekan oke oke saja di tombolnya. Kalau tidak ada persetujuan itu tidak mungkin ada pinjaman," jelas dia.Sepanjang Oktober 2019 terdapat 297 fintech pinjaman online ilegal. Adapun dari awal tahun hingga saat ini telah ada 1.773 Fintech pinjaman online ilegal.Simak Video "1.230 Fintech Ilegal Dibekukan Selama Tahun 2018-2019"[Gambas:Video 20detik](kil/eds)

Cobra and Tervel are preparing an unprecedented show in Plovdiv

02 Nov 2019, 08:14

Plovdiv will be the capital of boxing in mid-December. Kubrat Pulev, his brother Tervel and their manager Ivaylo Gotsev are coming to town to prepare an unprecedented boxing gala. They have chosen the Kolodrum Hall and are convinced that they will give a unique show to lovers about the men's game under the hood.
The exact date is yet to be chosen, but it is now known that the nail of the program will be Tervel Pulev's fight with a very strong opponent, which the organizers prefer to keep secret at this point. The news was reported to Maritsa manager Ivaylo Gotsev, who is a Plovdiv resident.

Here's what he said about the upcoming show in Plovdiv:

First, I want to congratulate people in this ancient and beloved city of mine. I was born in Sofia but I am a child of Thrace. I'm half Thracian. I always enjoy going to Plovdiv. Besides being a very beautiful city with a thousand years of history, Plovdiv is also the cradle of great sportsmen. I bow to the Plovdiv Boxing School, which has given masters at world level. We want to give Plovdiv a really great show. I believe we will fill the "Kolodrum" and the show will be remembered for a long time afterwards. Sport Minister Krasen Kralev suggested that he be in Sofia, but I, my brother and Ivaylo strongly insisted that he be in Plovdiv. Not only is Ivaylo a Plovdiv citizen.
I prefer to keep secret for now who will be Tervel Pulev's opponent until the last details are clarified. Surely the opponent will be a great boxer. We will not look for a boxing pear on which Tervel earns false confidence. There will be many more intriguing battles at Kolodrum. Have patience, it will soon become clear.
